description: This Java interface defines contract for services that can be checked for availability, including methods for checking current status and waiting for availability with a timeout.

classes.name: ServiceAvailabilityCheckable
classes.description: An interface for services that support checking if they are available and waiting for availability.

methods.name: isServiceAvailable
methods.description: Check if the service is currently available.

methods.name: waitForServiceToBeAvailable
methods.description: Wait for the service to become available within a specified timeout period.
